FCC ID LDK102050 redirects to PPD-AR5BCB-00032 ==Links of Interest== [http://software.cisco.com/download/type.html?mdfid=278853375&flowid=7243&softwareid=280775081 '''Cisco''''s drivers] (requires '''Cisco.com''' login)
[http://www.cisco.com/en/US/prod/collateral/wireless/ps6442/ps4555/ps5818/product_data_sheet09186a00801ebc29.html Datasheet] ==Pictures==
'''User Images''' File:Cisco air cb21ag a k9 rev 02.jpg|board shot
[[Has images::internal| ]] ==Notes== ===lspci -nnv dump=== 
06:00.0 Ethernet controller [0200]: Qualcomm Atheros AR5212/AR5213 Wireless Network Adapter [168c:0013] (rev 01)
        Subsystem: Cisco Aironet Wireless Communications CB21 802.11a/b/g Cardbus Adapter [14b9:cb21]
        Flags: bus master, medium devsel, latency 168, IRQ 19
        Memory at f1d00000 (32-bit, non-prefetchable) [size=64K]
        Capabilities: [44] Power Management version 2
        Kernel driver in use: ath5k
===ath5k info dump=== 
ath: EEPROM regdomain: 0x10
ath: EEPROM indicates we should expect a direct regpair map
ath: Country alpha2 being used: CO
ath: Regpair used: 0x10
ath5k: phy10: Atheros AR5213A chip found (MAC: 0x59, PHY: 0x43)
ath5k: phy10: RF5112B multiband radio found (0x36)
===Probable revision map=== 74-3481-01 to 74-3481-02 - made in taiwan - 47-16465-01 rev A0 - AR5212 + AR5112 - '''rev 01'''
74-3481-02 - made in china - 47-16465-01 rev A0 - AR5212 + AR5112 - '''rev 01'''
74-3481-03 to 74-3481-06 - made in china - 47-16465-02 rev A0 - AR5213A + AR5112 - '''rev 02''' [[Category:English Documentation]]
